channel.title: GETTING COMPILE&"RUN" to Work!
channel.description:
hey guys, i got a new computer and my "java" is on my desk top! i downloaded a server to mess with because i haven't coded for a long time and want to make a 100% new server. I need help getting the Run and Compile to work.. sounds easy? but For some reason it defiantly will not work no mater what i try, this is 1 thing im not a expert in... please comment on what i may need to do? or give me a link!
We can also just team viewer it or something-- Email Me at Kingprodigy@hotmail.com

item.title: GETTING COMPILE&"RUN" to Work!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

If your java is on your desktop, then edit the lines that point to ur java to the current dir of ur java

Read full topic

item.title: GETTING COMPILE&"RUN" to Work!
item.dc:creator: @king_prodigy king prodigy
item.description:
@king_prodigy wrote:

tyb97:

Post ur compiler and run on here

the run is shorter and they prob dont make since because ive messed with em and the compiler is super long. but here ya go

“run server”

cd bin
@echo off
@echo off
start C:\users\cole\desktop\java\bin\javac -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

“run”
@echo off
Title Client
START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

“64 bit run”
@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit
“windows 7 run”
cd bin
@echo off
@echo off
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\javac -Xmx1024m -cp . client

Please notice my java is on my desktop and downloaded to the desktop

Read full topic
